title: What type of font should I use?
content: I am a student studying Graphic Design and I am in an information design class. I am in the process of designing an exhibit on how music effects the memory. I was wondering if anybody had some ideas of what font would be the best for displaying information in an exhibit style of environment?
author: abostrom

comments.content: What size are your environment displays? Have you tried any fonts out at that size yet?
The exhibit size is fairly big. It is about 20 ft x 20 ft. Most of the posters that I will be putting up will be read from about 5-10 ft. away.
